item.description:
We know it is late notice, but we just noticed the holiday weekend, and we thought we would take advantage of it.

Join us on Salem Common with all of your outdoor games. We'll be bringing badminton, bocce ball, and some two-player games. Hopefully we'll have some volunteers with horseshoes, croquet, etc. Also, feel free to bring blankets and chairs and something to drink.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be by the Washington arch, near Winter Street

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Outdoor games on the Common
